feed.title: Pedro R. C. Dallâ€™Antonia
feed.subtitle: Final-year M.Sc. student in Applied Mathematics at FGV EMAp. Researching Probabilistic Machine Learning, GFlowNets, and Prediction-Powered Inference. Formerly Quantitative Researcher at Kadima Asset Management and Midshipman at the Brazilian Navy.

entry.title: Setting up the new site
entry.content: Start of the new academic website. In the future, I plan to write about GFlowNets, Variational Inference, and optimization tricks.
